_xResult.title: Treat Me Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cashmere coat with belt
_xResult.longdesc:
Treat yourself this season to the custom made cashmere coat of your dreams. This custom made jacket is loose and playful, drawing on asymmetric shapes and a loose silhouette to create the bodice. This made to measure piece comes equipped with long-sleeves and a belt, perfect for tying and synching at the waist for shape.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
